Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Observation
b) Defect Observed: Navigation system GPS signal loss. Malfunction reported by flight crew.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Environmental exposure causing accelerated degradation of protective coatings
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Radar System component. Testing
confirmed performance below acceptable limits.
c) Remedial Measures Adjust calibration settings to manufacturer specifications
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Update technical documentation with lessons learned
d) Attributable Code: M - Other Reasons
Remarks: Complete defect analysis performed. Lessons learned documented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Design assessment confirms component operated within specified limits. Recommend enhanced inspection protocol.
